channel.title: Sphinx on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Sphinx on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Use advanced type features in Sphinx-2.4
item.description: I just released Sphinx-2.4.0. Sphinx is aiming for a regular release every two months, so it’s generally on schedule. In 2.4.0, the features around autodoc have been greatly improved. In this article, I would like to summarize the improvements. Support for variable annotation autodoc: Support type annotations for variables #7051: autodoc: Support instance variables without defaults (PEP-526) Previously, the variable annotations in the code were not documented, but since 2.
